data.title: Burkina Faso population 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise population of Burkina Faso from 1950 to 2100 by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text:
The current population of Burkina Faso is 23,618,108 as of August 18, 2024, based on interpolation of the latest United Nations data. The population of Burkina Faso is projected at 23,840,247, or 23.84 million, as of July 1, 2024. The total population in Burkina Faso is projected at 23,251,485, or 23.25 million people for the year 2023.

Burkina Faso ranks 60th in the world by population on the 237 countries and territories list. Burkina Faso is ranked 20th among 58 countries and territories in Africa.
